Employment at DOB

The Divison of the Budget is a vibrant, challenging, and creative place to work. Come be part of the team that keeps Government moving forward.

Open Positions
Become a Budget Specialist

Who We Are

An awesome and impactful statement about who we are as an agency! Think about something really engaging that demonstrates the values of the agency and the imapct of the work.

This link is optional

Title of the text area

Heading Level 3

Heading Level 4

Heading Level 5

The OGS Bureau of Commercial Management is the primary point of contact for all commercial lease activity in OGS-managed buildings. The Bureau:

  • Procures new tenants;
  • Negotiates and writes lease agreements for state-owned space; and
  • Manages lease agreements.

Parties interested in leasing retail space should respond to Requests for Information posted below, or contact the Bureau of Commercial Management by email at foodservice@ogs.ny.gov.

This is an area for a brief, but really inspirational quote. Possibly a few sentences from a testimonial too. - The Person who said this

Third Card

Highlight Frame in Gray

The vendors shown on this list have been approved by the Vendor Responsibility Group of the OGS Design & Construction Group (D&C) within the past year. The list was developed as a reference tool for government agencies, vendors and other organizations that need the assistance of construction services from qualified vendors, particularly in case of a disaster or other emergency declaration in New York State.

Download the List

Highlight Frame in Secondary

The vendors shown on this list have been approved by the Vendor Responsibility Group of the OGS Design & Construction Group (D&C) within the past year. The list was developed as a reference tool for government agencies, vendors and other organizations that need the assistance of construction services from qualified vendors, particularly in case of a disaster or other emergency declaration in New York State.

Download the List
